name: Mithral Dragon Wyrmling
description: A medium-sized dragon with impressive agility and a sleek, metallic sheen, embodying neutrality and magical resilience.
memorable: Its Shard Breath ability creates difficult terrain and unleashes a flurry of damaging metallic shards.
goals: To outmaneuver opponents and resist magical control while asserting dominance in combat.
relations: May be encountered alongside other dragons or magical creatures.
environment: Typically found in areas with open skies and magical influences.
strengths: Exhibits strong mobility with its flying speed and magic resistance, making it tough in magical combat.
weaknesses: As a young dragon, it may struggle against more seasoned adventurers despite its abilities.
attacks: Sharp bite attack inflicting piercing damage and the ability to end magical effects.
most_powerful_ability: Shard Breath; unleashes a cone of metallic shards causing slashing damage and creating difficult terrain.
senses: It has blindsight up to 10 feet, allowing it to detect nearby creatures effectively.
skills: Excels in Insight and Perception, making it adept at noticing hidden threats.
additional_information: Magic Resistance providing advantage against spells.
test_queries: young dragon that creates difficult terrain
medium dragon with powerful breath weapon
